Hero.title: Mario Hinojosa Freire
Hero.description: Fullstack web developer, co-founder and programmer at eStudents, passionate about technology and programming, seeking new challenges and continuously learning.

Contact.title: Let's talk
Contact.description: If you have any questions, a project in mind, or you're recruiting and interested in my profile, please don't hesitate to contact me via LinkedIn or email (you have both links in the top left corner).
Contact.emailPrompt: You can also write to me at: galizaragozadev@gmail.com
Contact.footer: I'll make time as soon as possible so we can meet and delve into the details of your inquiry.

Education.heading: Education & Certifications
Education.masterTitle: Master's in Full-Stack Development / October 2023 - May 2024
Education.masterDescription: Master's in Full-Stack Development from Nuclio Digital School (October 2023 – March 2024), which I completed intensively and online covering both front-end and back-end topics. I learned and applied key technologies —React, JavaScript (HTML, CSS, and Tailwind), Node.js, WebSockets, and MongoDB— and delved into web protocols, coding best practices, and security in development. I worked under agile methodologies (SCRUM) and used version control with Git as well as continuous integration/continuous delivery (CI/CD) processes. Thanks to practical projects, I strengthened my communication, adaptability, teamwork, and mediation skills, developing real end-to-end solutions and collaborating effectively with my peers to ensure application quality and scalability.

Experience.heading: Experience
Experience.description1: eStudents is a startup where I serve as a full-stack developer, responsible for designing, implementing, and deploying the web application, from the database to the user interface. I also perform other functions, such as DevOps.
Experience.description2: In this role, I use a wide variety of languages and frameworks, such as Next, Node, MongoDB, Tailwind, React, and TypeScript. I use LLMs to streamline and optimize my tasks and produce daily documentation and reports on changes and updates for my teammates. I also participate in meetings where next steps and objectives are decided.
Experience.note: The main site is still under development; you can visit the landing page by clicking the image in the projects section.
